thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Ryan F.
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Ryan F.

author: Ryan F.
title: Ryan F.
text: I couldn't have had a better experience at Town Fair Tire in Enfield, CT. I spoke with Dave on the phone and he helped me get what I was looking for. He was very knowledgeable and informative. I will certainly be back in the future and will highly suggest this store to anyone and to see Dave!
